BlackStorm:

BlackStorm was starting to be more concoius about her, but he 
couldn't coordinate her ideas and understand what was going on 
there. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> 
> Rodimus cuts in on the comm channel.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: In that case we cant wait. I'll return to the base 
and 
> start to upload the safe program that Yggdrasil took from me. That 
> wont trigger the self destruct or whatever it is. But I dont want 
to 
> tamper with that directly untill their control system is destroyed.
> 
> Rodimus speeds up ahead of Kup, then hits the break while turning 
the 
> wheel. His car form suddely spins around, heading back for the 
> Maximal base.
> 
> Kup continues on towards the battle.
>

> 
> Rodimus opens a commlink to Yggdrasil.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Yggdrasil, it's Rodimus. We have Nightlight secure 
in 
> a CR chamber at base. I need to start the upload of the memory 
> program. I'm either going to need you back at base to help or 
> instructions. Do you have the program on you or in your personal 
> computer back at base?
